pivot.wtk
Class ApplicationContext

java.lang.Object
  pivot.wtk.ApplicationContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
BrowserApplicationContext, DesktopApplicationContext
public abstract class ApplicationContext
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for application contexts.

setInterval

public static int setInterval(java.lang.Runnable runnable,
                              long period)
Schedules a task for repeated execution. The task will be executed on the UI thread.

Parameters:
runnable - The task to execute.
period - The interval at which the task should be executed.
Returns:
An integer ID that can be used to cancel execution of the task.

clearInterval

public static void clearInterval(int intervalID)
Cancels execution of a scheduled task.

Parameters:

setTimeout

                             long timeout)
Schedules a task for execution after an elapsed time.

Parameters:
runnable - The task to execute.
timeout - The time after which the task should begin executing.

clearTimeout

Cancels execution of a scheduled task.

Parameters:

queueCallback

public static void queueCallback(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
Queues a task to execute after all pending events have been processed and returns without waiting for the task to complete.

Parameters:
runnable - The runnable to execute.

queueCallback

public static void queueCallback(java.lang.Runnable runnable,
                                 boolean wait)
Queues a task to execute after all pending events have been processed and optionally waits for the task to complete.

Parameters:
runnable - The runnable to execute.
wait - If true, does not return until the runnable has executed. Otherwise, returns immediately.
